description: This quick and easy dish plays on tofu's ability to take on the flavour of other ingredients.
name: Chilli Tofu Stir-fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Return the cashews and tofu to the pan and drizzle in the chilli sauce. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce with the cornflour and pour into the pan, along with the stock. Toss over the heat for 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbling. Serve with boiled rice or Chinese-style egg noodles.

Return the cashews and tofu to the pan and drizzle in the chilli sauce. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce with the cornflour and pour into the pan, along with the stock. Toss over the heat for 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbling. Serve with boiled rice or Chinese-style egg noodles.

Return the cashews and tofu to the pan and drizzle in the chilli sauce. In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce with the cornflour and pour into the pan, along with the stock. Toss over the heat for 2-3 minutes, or until the sauce is bubbling. Serve with boiled rice or Chinese-style egg noodles.
